title: How YouTube's Left is Converting the Far Right
description:
Here's how a leftist, transgender, PhD dropout is winning over white supremacists and more on YouTube.  
Guest: Micah Loewinger, producer at WNYC's On The Media.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Slate Podcasts
itunes:subtitle: Natalie Wynn, otherwise known as ContraPoints, lures in fans of the far right and changes minds.
